item.title: HOW TO: A WordPress update created a fatal error and now I can’t login
item.description: You just updated your plugins or theme in WordPress and now you can’t visit wp-admin or visit your website. Everything is broken, what you’re looking at is the White Screen of Death. It’s easy to recover from the 2 most common errors that kill your WordPress website. Fix the issue in 3 simple steps. When something goes wrong WordPress the most common cause is a plugin conflict or a problem with your theme.
